explains: adv. 宽松地；放荡地；轻率地

sentences.en: His shirt hung loosely over his thin shoulders.
sentences.cn: 他的衬衣松松垮垮地挂在他瘦削的双肩上。

sentences.en: He had lost weight and the suit hung loosely on him.
sentences.cn: 他体重减轻了，这套衣服穿在身上松松垮垮的。

sentences.en: She wore her hair loosely knotted on top of her head.
sentences.cn: 她在头顶上打了个松松的发髻。
